001package game;
002import java.io.InputStream;
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Scanner;
006import javax.swing.Timer;
007
008/**
009 *  This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. 
010 *  "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.
011 * 
012 *  This class creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts
013 *  the game.  It also evaluates and executes the commands that 
014 *  the parser returns.
015 * 
016 * @author  Michael Kolling and David J. Barnes
017 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2019) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025)
018 */
019public class GameEngine
020{
021    // Delay between test commands (ms) to let UI refresh images
022    private static final int TEST_DELAY_MS = 2000;
023    // Global game duration (ms) before automatic loss
024    private static final int GAME_DURATION_MS = 45000; // 10 minutes
025
026    private final Parser        aParser;
027    //private Room          aCurrentRoom;
028    //private Stack<Room> aPreviouRooms;
029    //private LinkedList<Room> aLastRooms;
030    private UserInterface aGui;
031    private boolean aTestMode;
032    private Player aPlayer;
033    private Timer aGameTimer;
034    private Timer aCountdownTimer;
035    private long aGameStartMillis;
036
037    /**
038     * Constructor for objects of class GameEngine
039     */
040    public GameEngine()
041    {
042        this.aParser = new Parser();
043        this.createRooms();
044        //this.aPreviouRooms = new Stack<>();
045        this.aTestMode = false;
046       
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Sets the GUI
051     * @param pUserInterface User Interface 
052     */
053    public void setGUI( final UserInterface pUserInterface )
054    {
055        this.aGui = pUserInterface;
056        this.printWelcome();
057        this.startGameTimer();
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Print out the opening message for the player.
062     */
063    private void printWelcome()
064    {
065        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
066        this.aGui.println( "Welcome to game of The return of Yamata no Orochi !" );
067        this.aGui.println( "The monster came back to life and Tetsuma must create a katana to save Japan !." );
068        this.aGui.println("From now, you have to help him find materials to let him create the weapon !");
069        this.aGui.println( "Type 'help' if you need help." );
070        this.aGui.print( "\n" );
071        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
072        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
073            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
074    }
075
076   /**
077     * Create all the rooms and link their exits together.
078     */
079    private void createRooms(){
080        Room vShirago = new Room("in your village of birth, Shirakawa-go.","./Images/shirakawa.jpg");
081        Room vGujoHachi = new Room("In the Gujô Hachiman castle.","./Images/gujohachi.jpg");
082        Room vOsaka = new Room("in the Osaka city.","./Images/Osaka.jpg");
083        Room vTsushi = new Room("in the Tsushima island.","./Images/Tsushima.jpg");
084        Room vSeki = new Room("in the Seki blacksmiths village, it's the end of your odyssey.","./Images/seki.jpg");
085        Room vNara = new Room("in the Nara city known for its deers.","./Images/Nara_fire.jpg");
086        Room vGinkaku = new Room("in the Ginkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Ginkakuji_fall_2.jpg");
087        Room vKinkaku = new Room("in the Kinkaku-ji temple.","./Images/Kinkaku.jpg");
088        Room vYoshino = new Room("in the Yoshino national park, the forest is big here.","./Images/Yoshino_park.jpg");
089        Room vNagoya  = new Room("in the Nagoya city","./Images/Nagoya.jpg");
090        Room vMtFuji = new Room("at the foot of the Mt Fuji.","./Images/MtFuji.jpg");
091        Room vTokyo = new Room("in the Tokyo tower, the biggest tower of Japan.","./Images/tokyo_tower.jpg");
092        Room vSapporo = new Room("in the Sapporo city, in the north of Japan.","./Images/sapporo_snow.jpg");
093        Room vAogashi = new Room("in the island of Aogashima, in the middle of the ocean.","./Images/Aogashima.jpg");
094        
095        
096        
097        vShirago.setExit("south", vGujoHachi);
098        vShirago.addItem("Mochi", new Item("A sweety mochi", 1));
099
100        // GujoHachi : up -> MtFuji, west -> Osaka
101        vGujoHachi.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
102        vGujoHachi.setExit("west", vOsaka);
103
104        // Osaka : north -> Ginkaku, east -> GujoHachi, south -> Nara, west -> Tsushi
105        vOsaka.setExit("north", vGinkaku);
106        vOsaka.setExit("east", vGujoHachi);
107        vOsaka.setExit("south", vNara);
108        vOsaka.setExit("west", vTsushi);
109        vOsaka.addItem("Anko mochi", new Item("A mochi with anko flavour of Osaka", 2));
110
111        // Ginkaku : east -> Kinkaku, south -> Osaka
112        vGinkaku.setExit("east", vKinkaku);
113        vGinkaku.setExit("south", vOsaka);
114        vGinkaku.addItem("Silver Shigane", new Item("A silver metal used for blade crafting", 3));
115
116        // Kinkaku : south -> Ginkaku
117        vKinkaku.setExit("south", vGinkaku);
118        vKinkaku.addItem("Gold Tamagane", new Item("A golden metal used for blade crafting", 3));
119
120        // Tsushi : north -> Osaka, east -> Seki
121        vTsushi.setExit("north", vOsaka);
122        vTsushi.setExit("east", vSeki);
123        vTsushi.addItem("Volcanic stone", new Item("A stone impregnated by the sea god's energy", 2));
124
125        // Seki : west -> Tsushi
126        vSeki.setExit("west", vTsushi);
127
128        // Nara : east -> Yoshino
129        vNara.setExit("east", vYoshino);
130        vNara.setTrapDoorExit("south", vOsaka);
131        vNara.addItem("Horn of the goddess", new Item("A horn given by the goddess of deers", 2));
132
133        // Yoshino : east -> Nagoya
134        vYoshino.setExit("east", vNagoya);
135        vYoshino.addItem("Bamboo of holy forest", new Item("A rare type of bamboo which only exists here", 2));
136
137        // Nagoya : up -> MtFuji, west -> Yoshino
138        vNagoya.setExit("west", vYoshino);
139        vNagoya.setExit("up", vMtFuji);
140        vNagoya.setTrapDoorExit("south", vTokyo);
141
142        // MtFuji : north -> Sapporo, east -> Tokyo, south -> Nagoya, west -> GujoHachi
143        vMtFuji.setExit("down", vSapporo);
144        vMtFuji.setExit("east", vTokyo);
145        vMtFuji.setExit("south", vNagoya);
146        vMtFuji.setExit("west", vGujoHachi);
147
148        // Tokyo : west -> Nagoya
149        vTokyo.setExit("west", vNagoya);
150
151        // Sapporo : south -> Aogashi
152        vSapporo.setExit("south", vAogashi);
153        vSapporo.addItem("Ice'dragon's amulet",new Item("An amulet which freezes monsters and yokais", 5));
154
155
156        // Aogashi : north -> Sapporo, south -> Tokyo
157        vAogashi.setExit("north", vSapporo);
158        vAogashi.setExit("south", vTokyo);
159        vAogashi.addItem("Aogashima's salt", new Item("Holy salt used for purifying monsters", 1));
160        this.aPlayer = new Player("Tetsuma");
161        this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vShirago);
162
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Print a sentence.
167     */
168    private void eat(final Command pCmd){
169        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
170            this.aGui.println("Eat what ?");
171            return;
172        }
173        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
174        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
175        if(vItem == null){
176            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
177        } 
178        if (!vItemName.equals("Anko Mochi")){
179            this.aGui.println("You can't eat this item !");
180            return;
181
182        }
183        this.aPlayer.superPower();
184        this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
185        this.aPlayer.setWeight(this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight());
186        this.aGui.println("You have eaten the Anko Mochi ! Your maximum weight has been doubled !");
187        return;
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * Print out the description of the current room.
192     */
193    private void look(){
194        this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
195        if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
196            this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * Go back to the previous room
201     */
202    private void back(){
203        Room vPreviousRoom = this.aPlayer.getPreviousRoom();
204        if(vPreviousRoom == null || this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().isExit(vPreviousRoom)){
205            this.aGui.println("You can't go back any further !");
206            this.aPlayer.emptyPreviousRooms();
207            return;
208        }
209        else{
210            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vPreviousRoom);
211            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
212            if ( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null )
213                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
214        }
215    }
216
217    /**
218     * Start (or restart) the global game timer. When it fires, the player loses.
219     */
220    private void startGameTimer(){
221        if (this.aGameTimer != null){
222            this.aGameTimer.stop();
223        }
224        if (this.aCountdownTimer != null){
225            this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
226        }
227        this.aGameStartMillis = System.currentTimeMillis();
228
229        // countdown display each second
230        this.aCountdownTimer = new Timer(1000, e -> {
231            long vRemaining = this.remainingTime();
232            if (vRemaining <= 0){
233                this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
234                // Let the main timer handle loss, just show 00:00 now
235                this.aGui.updateTimerLabel("00:00");
236            } else {
237                this.aGui.updateTimerLabel(this.formatTime(vRemaining));
238            }
239        });
240        this.aCountdownTimer.setRepeats(true);
241        this.aCountdownTimer.start();
242
243        this.aGameTimer = new Timer(GAME_DURATION_MS, e -> {
244            this.aGui.println("Time is up! You lose.");
245            this.endGame();
246        });
247        this.aGameTimer.setRepeats(false);
248        this.aGameTimer.start();
249
250        // initialise display immediately
251        this.aGui.updateTimerLabel(this.formatTime(GAME_DURATION_MS));
252    }
253
254    /**
255     * Calculate remaining milliseconds before time is up.
256     * @return Remaining milliseconds
257     */
258    private long remainingTime(){
259        long vElapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - this.aGameStartMillis;
260        return Math.max(0, GAME_DURATION_MS - vElapsed);
261    }
262
263    /**
264     * Format milliseconds as mm:ss string.
265     * @param pMillis Milliseconds to format
266     * @return Formatted string
267     */
268    private String formatTime(final long pMillis){
269        long vTotalSeconds = pMillis / 1000;
270        long vMinutes = vTotalSeconds / 60;
271        long vSeconds = vTotalSeconds % 60;
272        return String.format("%02d:%02d", vMinutes, vSeconds);
273    }
274
275    /**
276     * Take an item from the room
277     * @param pCmd The command to process
278     */
279    public void take(final Command pCmd){
280        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
281            this.aGui.println("Take what ?");
282            return;
283        }
284        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
285        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItem(vItemName);
286        if(vItem == null){
287            this.aGui.println("This item is not here !");
288        } else{
289            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() + vItem.getItemWeight();
290            if(vNewWeight > this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight()){
291                this.aGui.println("You can't take this item, it's too heavy !");
292            } else{
293                this.aPlayer.addItem(vItemName, vItem);
294                this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
295                this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().removeItem(vItemName);
296                this.aGui.println("You have taken the " + vItemName);
297            }
298        }
299    }
300
301    /**
302     * Drop an item in the room
303     * @param pCmd The command to process
304     */
305    public void drop(final Command pCmd){
306        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
307            this.aGui.println("Drop what ?");
308            return;
309        }
310        String vItemName = pCmd.getSecondWord();
311        Item vItem = this.aPlayer.getItem(vItemName);
312        if(vItem == null){
313            this.aGui.println("You don't have this item !");
314        } else{
315            this.aPlayer.removeItem(vItemName);
316            int vNewWeight = this.aPlayer.getWeight() - vItem.getItemWeight();
317            this.aPlayer.setWeight(vNewWeight);
318            this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().addItem(vItemName, vItem);
319            this.aGui.println("You have dropped the " + vItemName);
320        }
321    }
322    /**
323     * Show player's inventory
324     */
325    private void playerInventory(){
326        this.aGui.println("You have : \n" + this.aPlayer.getItems());
327        this.aGui.println("Current weight : " + this.aPlayer.getWeight() + " / " + this.aPlayer.getMaxWeight());
328       
329    }
330
331
332    /**
333     * Process the command. Return true if the command ends the game, false otherwise.
334     * @param pCmdLine The command to process.
335     */
336    public void interpretCommand(final String pCmdLine) {
337        this.aGui.println( "> " + pCmdLine);
338        Command pCmd = this.aParser.getCommand( pCmdLine );
339        if (pCmd.isUnknown()) {
340            this.aGui.println("I don't know what you mean...");
341            return;
342        }
343        String vCommandWord = pCmd.getCommandWord();
344        if ("help".equals(vCommandWord)) {
345            this.printHelp();
346        } else if ("go".equals(vCommandWord)) {
347            this.goRooms(pCmd);
348        } else if ("quit".equals(vCommandWord)) {
349            if (pCmd.hasSecondWord()) {
350                this.aGui.println("Quit what ?");
351            } else {
352                this.endGame();
353            }
354
355        } else if("look".equals(vCommandWord)){
356            this.look();
357        } else if ("eat".equals(vCommandWord)){
358            this.eat(pCmd);
359        } else if ("back".equals(vCommandWord)){
360            this.back();
361        } else if("test".equals(vCommandWord)){
362            this.testFile(pCmd);
363        } else if("take".equals(vCommandWord)){
364            this.take(pCmd);
365        } else if("drop".equals(vCommandWord)){
366            this.drop(pCmd);
367        } else if("items".equals(vCommandWord)){
368            this.playerInventory();
369        }
370        else {
371            System.out.println("Erreur du programmeur : commande non reconnue !");
372            return;
373        }
374    }
375
376    
377    /**
378     * Launch a test file
379     * @param pCommand The command to process
380     */
381    private void testFile (final Command pCommand){
382        if (this.aTestMode) {
383            this.aGui.println("A test is already running, please wait.");
384            return;
385        }
386        if(pCommand.hasSecondWord() == false){
387            this.aGui.println("Error : you must specify a file name !");
388            return;
389        }
390      
391        String vFileName = pCommand.getSecondWord();
392        System.out.println("Test file : " + vFileName);
393        vFileName+=".txt";
394        System.out.println("Full file name : " + vFileName);
395        InputStream vInputStream = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(vFileName);
396        if (vInputStream == null){
397            this.aGui.println("Error : file not found !");
398            return;
399        }
400
401        List<String> vCommands = new ArrayList<>();
402        try (Scanner vScanner = new Scanner(vInputStream)){
403            while (vScanner.hasNextLine()){
404                String vLine = vScanner.nextLine().trim();
405                // Ignore empty lines and comments (starting with // or #)
406                if (!vLine.isEmpty() && !vLine.startsWith("//") && !vLine.startsWith("#")){
407                    vCommands.add(vLine);
408                }
409            }
410        }
411
412        if (vCommands.isEmpty()){
413            this.aGui.println("The test file is empty or only contains comments.");
414            return;
415        }
416
417        this.aTestMode = true;
418        final int[] vIndex = {0};
419        final Timer vTimer = new Timer(TEST_DELAY_MS, null);
420        vTimer.addActionListener(ev -> {
421            if (vIndex[0] < vCommands.size()){
422                String vNext = vCommands.get(vIndex[0]++);
423                this.interpretCommand(vNext);
424            } else {
425                vTimer.stop();
426                this.aTestMode = false;
427                this.aGui.println("Test finished.");
428            }
429        });
430        vTimer.setRepeats(true);
431        vTimer.start();
432    }
433
434   
435
436    // implementations of user commands:
437
438   /**
439     * Print out some help information.
440     * Here we print some stupid, cryptic message and a list of the command words.
441     */
442    public void printHelp(){
443        this.aGui.println("You are lost. You are alone.\r\n" + //
444                        "You wander around Japan.\r\n" + //
445                        "\r\n" + //
446                        "Your command words are:\r\n" +  this.aParser.showCommands() //
447                        );
448       
449    }
450    /**
451     * Go to the room in the given direction. If there is no room in that
452     * direction, print an error message.
453     * @param pCmd the command to process (should contain "go" and a direction).
454     */
455    private void goRooms(Command pCmd){
456        if(!pCmd.hasSecondWord()){
457            System.out.println("Go where ?");
458            return;
459        };
460        String vDirection = pCmd.getSecondWord();
461        Room vNextRoom = this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getExit(vDirection);
462        if(vNextRoom == null){
463            this.aGui.println("There's no door");
464        } else {
465            this.aPlayer.addPreviousRoom(this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom());
466            this.aPlayer.setCurrentRoom(vNextRoom);
467            this.aGui.println( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getLongDescription() );
468            if (this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() != null ){
469                this.aGui.showImage( this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getImageName() );
470                System.out.println("Image affichée");
471            } else{
472                System.out.println("Image non trouvée");
473            }
474        }
475    }
476
477
478    /**
479     * End the game
480     */
481    public void endGame(){
482        this.aGui.println( "Thank you for playing.  Good bye." );
483        this.aGui.enable( false );
484        if (this.aGameTimer != null){
485            this.aGameTimer.stop();
486        }
487        if (this.aCountdownTimer != null){
488            this.aCountdownTimer.stop();
489        }
490    }
491
492    /**
493     * Get item names present in the current room (for UI selection)
494     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
495     */
496    public String[] getCurrentRoomItemNames(){
497        return this.aPlayer.getCurrentRoom().getItemNames();
498    }
499
500    /**
501     * Get item names present in player's inventory (for UI selection)
502     * @return array of item names; empty array if none
503     */
504    public String[] getPlayerItemNames(){
505        return this.aPlayer.getInventoryItemNames();
506    }
